OUR CHANNEL/PODCAST & HOW TO SUPPORT IT:
My name is James and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado. Currently, the mainstream "news" networks are slanted, overproduced (e.g., lack spontaneity and authenticity) and overly-controlling in terms what views or people they will allow. We're working on growing a truly non-partisan platform that allows for raw, unedited takes on the big questions of our time. 

If this resonates with you, consider joining us in carrying out this vision:

OUR CHANNEL/PODCAST & HOW TO SUPPORT IT:
My name is James and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado. Currently, the mainstream "news" networks are slanted, overproduced (e.g., lack spontaneity and authenticity) and overly-controlling in terms what views or people they will allow. We're working on growing a truly non-partisan platform that allows for raw, unedited takes on the big questions of our time.

title: Suffering & God's Existence | Dr Brown Vs Dr Malpass
description:
A quick note on the topic of the debate. There was a bit of confusion regarding wither the debate was on whether evil should reduce our probability of theism more broadly (even if there is evidence for theism as Dr Brown argued) or whether there is an theistic explanation for a specific argument (Alex's argument in this case). Thus, if it seemed as if the speakers were talking past each other, this was my (James') fault and something I should have discerned and communicated prior to the debate with the speakers. I'm sorry for that.

Our (MDD) story: My name is James Kunz and I'm a doctoral student in psychology in Colorado, US. In my own academic journey, many academics (though to be fair, not all) have become closed to controversial people or topics and actually want to exclude people that question the status quo. Thus, my goal is to provide a non-partisan and truly-tolerant debate platform that welcomes everyone.

Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ModernDayDebate

OR:

Our SubscribeStar: https://tinyurl.com/y9293txs

_______________________________________________________________________________________

 *Want to make your own case for something you're passionate about?

The fastest way we can get you on the show is if you email me (moderndaydebate@gmail.com) the following:

1. Preferred opponent, topic & your position on it.
2. A link to a past debate you've had.
3. Any days of the week that you're open at 9 PM EST 
________________________________________________________________________________________

*Sometimes YouTube won't give you notifications of when we go live, so feel free to connect with us at our other social media (and be sure to say hello! :)) for reminders!

Discord: https://discord.gg/Qp7VtZ2

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ModernDayDebate (@ModernDayDebate)

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ModernDayDebate

Parler: https://tinyurl.com/y7vcjhm4

I'm a Christian. If you ever want prayer or just someone to talk to after a horrible day, please reach out and let me know. moderndaydebate@gmail.com

OUR PODCAST
Apple: apple.co/2LpVzR2
Spotify: spoti.fi/3nJwiOA

________________________________________________________________

Our story: My name is James Kunz and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado, US. In my own academic journey, many academics (though to be fair, not all) have become closed to controversial people or topics and actually want to exclude people that question the status quo. Thus, my goal is to provide a non-partisan and truly-tolerant debate platform that welcomes everyone.

If this resonates with you, consider joining our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ModernDayDebate

Use our Amazon portal link to enter Amazon, pay the same prices as normal, and Modern-Day Debate gets a small kickback (~3%) on any purchase you make on Amazon that day
Our Amazon portal link:  https://www.amazon.com/shop/modern-daydebate 
_______________________________________________________________________________________

Modern Day Debate on Discord:

Craving a challenge for your debating prowess? Fancy a shot at debating on MDD? Look no further than our Official MDD Discord server! Accessible through the Discord App (Android/iOS/PC) or your browser, the choice is yours!
Immerse yourself in non-stop debates, 24/7! Explore a variety of Text and Voice Channels designed for members to delve into discussions. Experience the thrill of live member debates on our Open Debate Stage, orchestrated by our dedicated staff, followed by occasional aftershows after the live stream debates!
Ready to join the intellectual battleground? Simply click the link below on your device of choice and become part of the discourse!

https://discord.gg/moderndaydebate

Our social media: 
Discord: https://discord.gg/moderndaydebate
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ModernDayDebate (@ModernDayDebate)
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ModernDayDebate

________________________________________________________________

Our story: My name is James Kunz and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado, US. In my own academic journey, many academics (though to be fair, not all) have become closed to controversial people or topics and actually want to exclude people that question the status quo. Thus, my goal is to provide a non-partisan and truly-tolerant debate platform that welcomes everyone.

If this resonates with you, consider joining our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ModernDayDebate

Or by using our Amazon shopping portal link: https://www.amazon.com/shop/modern-da...

title: Is Alcoholics Anonymous a Cult? | Jenna Belk Vs SpeedOfSound
description:
100% of super chats for the "Is AA a Cult?" debate will be going to UNCF, an organization that funds scholarships for black students and historically black colleges & universities (HBCUs). Their link is here:

https://www.uncf.org/

and their evaluation by the charity watchdog Charity Navigator is here below, showing they responsibly use their funds to do what they say they do:

https://www.charitynavigator.org/index.cfm?bay=search.summary&orgid=4614

description:
LINKS TO SPEAKERS:

Link to Aron Ra's Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/aronra

Link to Dr Trent Dougherty: https://twitter.com/trentdougherty

Link to Trent's podcast: www.slamharrispodcast.com

_________________________________________________________________

Our story: My name is James Kunz and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado, US. In my own academic journey, many academics (though to be fair, not all) have become closed to controversial people or topics and actually want to exclude people that question the status quo. Thus, my goal is to provide a non-partisan and truly-tolerant debate platform that welcomes everyone.

If this resonates with you, consider joining our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ModernDayDebate

Or by using our Amazon shopping portal link: https://www.amazon.com/shop/modern-daydebate 

If you use our Amazon link above, you pay the same prices as normal when you buy items, and Modern-Day Debate gets a small kickback (~3%) on any purchase you make on Amazon that day.

________________________________________________________________

Our story: My name is James Kunz and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado, US. In my own academic journey, many academics (though to be fair, not all) have become closed to controversial people or topics and actually want to exclude people that question the status quo. Thus, my goal is to provide a non-partisan and truly-tolerant debate platform that welcomes everyone.

If this resonates with you, consider joining our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ModernDayDebate

Or by using our Amazon shopping portal link: https://www.amazon.com/shop/modern-da...

title: Inspiring Philosophy Vs. Kent Hovind | Debate Can Evolution Fit within the Bible? | Podcast
description:
Links to speakers:

Inspiring Philosophy: https://www.youtube.com/user/InspiringPhilosophy

Kent Hovind: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxiEtqPja47nnqsJNrdOIQQ

OUR PODCAST

Apple: apple.co/2LpVzR2

Spotify: spoti.fi/3nJwiOA

________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________

Our story: My name is James Kunz and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado, US. In my own academic journey, many academics (though to be fair, not all) have become closed to controversial people or topics and actually want to exclude people that question the status quo. Thus, my goal is to provide a non-partisan and truly-tolerant debate platform that welcomes everyone.

If this resonates with you, consider joining our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ModernDayDebate

Or by using our Amazon shopping portal link: https://www.amazon.com/shop/modern-da... 

*If you use our Amazon link above, you pay the same prices as normal when you buy items, and Modern-Day Debate gets a small kickback (~3%) on any purchase you make on Amazon that day.

title: DEBATE: Creation Vs Evolution: Standing for Truth Vs RJ Downard
description:
Join us during this formal debate!

RJ Downard's website:
www.tortucan.wordpress.com

RJ Downard's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRdnABwU9uUJw1k40LGYcQA

Standing for Truth's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEJjuJEkxO9MAiy1RYWRk0w

Resources from Standing for Truth: 

A 2012 pedigree study put it 50 times faster than the 2010 fossil calibrated rate: https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/ajpa.22052 
 mtDNA mutation rate is at least tenfold higher than that of nuclear DNA. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3076767/ 
Genomes actually devolve over time in a process called genetic entropy. https://www.worldscientific.com/doi/pdf/10.1142/9789814508728_0006 
Human genome accumulates around 64 new mutations per generation because each full generation involves a number of cell divisions to generate gametes. 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mutation_rate & https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1460098/ 
A briskly ticking evolutionary clock. https://www.wired.com/2017/03/evolution-slower-looks-faster-think/ 
results suggest that mutation rates can evolve markedly over short evolutionary timescales and suggest the possibility of mapping mutational modifiers. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5435464/ 
We estimate that humans and chimpanzees have accumulated approximately 140,000 slightly deleterious mutations each. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC544929/ 
studies came to the same conclusion and warned that phylogenetic studies have “substantially underestimated the rate of mtDNA divergence”.
 http://science.sciencemag.org/content/279/5347/news-summaries 

Excerpt from abstract: "The Human Gene Mutation Database (HGMD®) constitutes a comprehensive collection of published germline mutations in nuclear genes that underlie, or are closely associated with human inherited disease. At the time of writing (March 2017), the database contained in excess of 203,000 different gene lesions identified in over 8000 genes manually curated from over 2600 journals. With new mutation entries currently accumulating at a rate exceeding 17,000 per year! , The public version of HGMD  http://www.hgmd.cf.ac.uk/ac/index.php   

Net loss of information a fact:
https://www.worldscientific.com/doi/abs/10.1142/9789814508728_0014

Synergistic epistasis no help to stop genome degradation:
https://www.worldscientific.com/doi/abs/10.1142/9789814508728_0013 

Multiple Overlapping Genetic Codes Profoundly Reduce the Probability of Beneficial Mutation
https://www.worldscientific.com/doi/abs/10.1142/9789814508728_0006

https://answersingenesis.org/theory-of-evolution/still-no-replacement-darwin-response/
https://answersingenesis.org/charles-darwin/replacing-darwin-debate-stage-report/
https://answersingenesis.org/theory-of-evolution/no-replacement-of-darwin-response/
https://answersingenesis.org/genetics/mitochondrial-dna/origin-human-mitochondrial-dna-differences-new-generation-time-data-both-suggest-unified-young-earth/
https://answersingenesis.org/natural-selection/speciation/on-the-origin-of-eukaryotic-species-genotypic-and-phenotypic-diversity/

Our story: My name is James Kunz and I'm a PhD student in psychology in Colorado, US. In my own academic journey, many academics (though to be fair, not all) have become closed to controversial people or topics and actually want to exclude people that question the status quo. Thus, my goal is to provide a non-partisan and truly-tolerant debate platform that welcomes everyone.

If this resonates with you, consider joining our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ModernDayDebate
